full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 99 of 261 1260 LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross 1 (In open court) 2 BY MS. STERNHEIM: 3 Q. Kate, were you involved in a custody dispute with the father of your child? 4 5 A. Yes. 6 Q. And Kate, did you ask a friend to plant drugs on the father of your child to advance your custody case? 7 8 A. Absolutely not. 9 Q. And are you familiar with a man named Tim Powers? 10 A. Yes. 11 Q. And as you sit here, you did not ask Mr. Powers to help you with your custody dispute? 12 13 A. No. 14 Q. You had been involved in a situation in the late '90s involving a man who is connected to the Royal Family. Do you know who I'm talking about? 15 16 17 A. Yes. 18 Q. And that was someone who you had a friendship with; correct? 19 20 A. An acquaintanceship. 21 Q. But a friendly acquaintanceship, it was someone that you had spoken to at times; correct? 22 23 A. A couple of times. 24 Q. And the two of you had an interaction while you were at the Cannes Film Festival in France; correct? 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012850

text_blocks.content: (In open court) BY MS. STERNHEIM: Q. Kate, were you involved in a custody dispute with the father of your child? A. Yes. Q. And Kate, did you ask a friend to plant drugs on the father of your child to advance your custody case? A. Absolutely not. Q. And are you familiar with a man named Tim Powers? A. Yes. Q. And as you sit here, you did not ask Mr. Powers to help you with your custody dispute? A. No. Q. You had been involved in a situation in the late '90s involving a man who is connected to the Royal Family. Do you know who I'm talking about? A. Yes. Q. And that was someone who you had a friendship with; correct? A. An acquaintanceship. Q. But a friendly acquaintanceship, it was someone that you had spoken to at times; correct? A. A couple of times. Q. And the two of you had an interaction while you were at the Cannes Film Festival in France; correct?

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and legible format. There are no visible redactions or damage.
